text:
New from the #APSFNewsletter: 

#Chloroquine & #Hydroxychloroquine Drug-Drug Interactions.

“The terminal half-life [of these drugs] is 1-2 months.”

By @MarcucciMd, Neil Sandson MD, Matt DeCaro MD, and Wayne Nicholson MD, PharmD #COVID19 #COVID2019. 

https://t.co/FZKRyIq8aq https://t.co/DzEcKYwNgR
